info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 2:35PM EDT until June 16 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Bladen County in southeastern North Carolina... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 235 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Elizabethtown to near Harrells, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Lagoon, Lisbon, White Lake and Bladen County Hospital. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
